attributes.action: Ban the Use of Animals in Circuses
attributes.additional_details:
All animals are beautiful, sentient beings. They have emotions, feelings, sensitivities and isecurities, just as we do. They deserve to be protected, not humiliated for the entertainment of the masses, by being forced to perform tricks and routines in a circus ring.
To any civilized country, such as the United Kingdom professes itself to be, the idea of using and humiliating animals for pure entertainment should be abhorrent. That is why we, the undersigned, excersise our democratic right to demand that the governement brings to end the cruel practice of using animals in circuses.
